import React, { useState } from 'react' import Blog from './Blog' import BlogForm from './BlogForm' const Blogs = ( handleLoginButton, handleLogoutButton, handleSubmitBlogButton, handlePasswordChange, handleUsernameChange, user ) => { const [blogFormVisible, setBlogFormVisible] = useState(false) if (!user) { return null } return (

Blogs

{user.name} is logged in.

{user.blogs.map(blog => )}
{ blogFormVisible ?

) } export default Blogs
